availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Avery Washington Fowler (Webster County and Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Elizabeth Hilliard Sandefur Fowler. Father of James T. Fowler, John W. Fowler, Lee Fowler, William H. Fowler, Mooty Fowler, and Melvina Fowler. Farmer in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Madisonville in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 475.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 3, p. 219A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #9711.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, September 1863, p. 8.
